name: Arrows: Elf Archer
description:
Join 'Arrows' the brave divine archer as he faces off against elves who are plotting to attack the human beings in this modern 2D fixed archery shooter game.

Defeat hordes of Elf archers. 

Enjoy lots of cool thrilling effects. 

Play exciting fun filled bonus rounds. 

 Enjoy a complete rich Archery Gameplay Experience.
